name: G2. GOVERNANCE AND MANAGEMENT OVERSIGHT
paragraph_1: The company's senior leadership should exercise oversight over how its policies and practices affect freedom of expression and privacy.

headers.text: Group - América Móvil - Freedom of Expression

cells.value: Does the company clearly disclose that the board of directors exercises formal oversight over how company practices affect freedom of expression and privacy?
Does the company clearly disclose that an executive-level committee, team, program or officer oversees how company practices affect freedom of expression and privacy?

cells.values: Does the company clearly disclose that a management-level committee, team, program or officer oversees how company practices affect freedom of expression and privacy?
